title: Northwest London City Break near Wembley Stadium
description: Stay almost close enough to hear the roar of a passionate Wembley Stadium crowd when you stay at Holiday Inn London - Brent Cross, an IHG Hotel. The hotel, just a 15-minute drive from the stadium, is host to the Junction Restaurant, where guests can indulge in classic British fish and chips and succulent steaks. Craving a coffee hit? Look no further than the onsite Lobby Bar, home to a Starbucks coffee house.
location_description: Holiday Inn London - Brent Cross, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Tilling Road, Brent Cross, London, NW2 1LP, England, United Kingdom
